cardBodyStrings.bodyString: The world will feel like a foreign place, but if you're quick, you'll learn the language in time.
The world will feel like a foreign place, but if you're quick, you'll learn the language in time.
Just don't let your defensiveness block out the entire world, which it is prone to do today.
It's like looking at yourself looking at yourself look at yourself...only without a mirror.
You may feel invincible, but you might alienate someone if you're not careful.
Just don't take brainless ones. Let your enemies make that mistake this time.
It might even feel like an entirely different place, even though nothing has changed...
You will be completely untouchable. Live large!
If you're patient, however, what you desire most will be drawn into your web.
Disaster turns into mere spectacle, and everything dangerous will stay at bay.
Keep close watch for a burst of genius, or it will die before you can grasp it.
Beware, however, because it will reach you quite suddenly, and very unexpectedly.
Your touch will make the world's problems slide off of your friends' backs. Use it.
It's better to keep one's mouth closed and be thought a fool than to open one's mouth...and remove all doubt.
Have you ever wanted to get inside someone else's head? This is your chance - delve deep, and learn everything you can.
Don't it always seem to go that you don't know what you've got til its gone?
You'll feel full of energy, electrified.
The world is entirely up in the air today. Catch what you care most about, and let the rest fall.
You will feel like diving into new things today, but you can't. Just fly high and stay fly.
Your touch will contain volatility and package what yearns to destroy. Use it.
You're just zipping here and there -- but don't act like a Damsel in distress, and the answers will come.
You will illuminate those around you with your inner energy -- just don't burn them along the way!
Your power will seem to stretch past your reach; use today to attack problems normally beyond you.
If you're not careful, you'll end up missing something that's coming straight at you!
Accuracy is the watch-word of the day. Don't strike where it's not going to do the most damage.
Everything around you will rumble, but if you can find the eye of the storm, you'll also find what you seek.
A single spark will cause a detonation of brilliance -- will it be your own, or someone elses?
The world is entirely up in the air today. Catch what you care most about, and let the rest fall.
You will feel like diving into new things today -- and you should; that's where your power lies!
The higher you soar, the harder they fall. Aim for the clouds and fall like rain upon your foes.
Something unexpected might happen, and it will happen fast.
Maybe the problems will be like ants below your feet - but watch out for the few that can get to you!
Your mind will be a fertile womb for numerous, brilliant ideas.
The world is your victim, but all eyes are on you. Subtlety is your only path; take it with confidence.
You may feel surrounded by Pests today, but they only give you power. It's your time to strike!
Your touch will bring the mighty down, but not right away. Use it, but don't get drained waiting.
Keep yourself grounded and stay under the radar, and no one will notice your little evils.
Someone has to suffer for you to thrive. Don't feel badly, but don't gloat -- it calls too much attention
Stay out of sight if at all possible. Obscurity is your best ally.
Will you support your allies at the cost of your own well-being, or sacrifice others for your own benefit?
Be assertive -- even agressive -- today. Every attack you make strengthens your grip on life.
They just can't get you out of their head, and the more they think about you the less they can think about anything else...
Gather your allies in secret. Your presence brings each one strength and assurance.
The world is your victim, but all eyes are on you. Subtlety is your only path; take it with confidence.
Don't worry if your tactics don't work right away. Bide your time; success is inevitable.
Today is a day for taking what you want, but not by force. Trick -- then treat!
Just attack. Keep attacking. Don't sneak, don't dodge, don't block. KEEP ATTACKING!
Your chances of success today are vanishing - as in, only vanishing will lead to success.
A moment of vulnerability cannot be avoided -- but survive it, and you'll be nigh-invulnerable.
Ever had, that pins-and-needles feeling in your legs? How about in your spleen?
The world is on the edge. Find a way to take advantage of it's fall.
Someone around you is having a meltdown -- can you handle what they will become?
Every move you make today will have lingering effects. Act quickly and decisively.
Yours is one giant footprint among a horde of smaller. Lead the masses!
The world is on the edge. Find a way to take advantage of it's fall.
Every fall -- your enemies' and your henchemens' -- benefits you today. Let God sort 'em out.
No matter how you struggle, you are caught in Death's web. Only deep change can free you.
Destruction brings about new life...or something like it. Don't be afraid; just be in control.
Your touch will corrupt the mighty and give rise to the meek. Use it.
Everything slowly descends into oblivion around you, and you can only watch.
Drink plenty of liquids, avoid sugar and white flour, and eat your veggies. I'm sure it's just a flu.
Some things truly are worthless. Today might be one of those things.
Remember those 'meek' I mentioned? They're coming for you...
Every obstacle in your path is also an opportunity. Conquer all and be the sole victor.
Someone near you will sacrifice themselves to bring your challenges down to size.
It may seem distasteful to profit from others' suffering. Ask yourself: so what?
Are you sure you want to live forever?
You feel powerless during the day - but just wait for Nightfall!/color]
The world resists all change. Adjust to your circumstances, because they won't adjust themselves.
You may not be effective today, but you can at least be left alone. Shoot for that.
EYour touch halts progress in it's tracks. Be careful how you use it.
Stop, and take a breath -- or six. You won't get much done, but you'll feel much better.
The ground itself may not be as stable as you like. Do you know where you stand?
Stop and take a moment to thank the little people who helped you get where you are today.
A threat may lurk unseen nearby -- but only Time will tell.
You will need to have thick skin and an iron-like fist to make the most of the day.
It's also a day to charge into the thick of things; you're hard to stop!
Put all of your eggs in one basket; don't worry, nothing will happen to the basket.
As long as you treat things with the appropriate gravity today, nothing will stand in your path.
A hefty shock lies Burrowed in the events of the day. Watch out!
Remember: Body like mountain, mind like meatloaf.
The world resists all change. Adjust to your circumstances, because they won't adjust themselves.
The more in tune with the Earth you are, the more endurable your circumstances will become.
Small nuisances can be safely ignored, but if big problems come, you'd better have Gratitude.
You can not just walk through a wall; there are smarter ways to get in: find a door.
The world will pass through an etherial elderberry bush full of kippers. No one will notice.
A man wearing a blue top hat will assault your best friend if she rides the subway.
The world will pass through an etherial elderberry bush full of kippers. No one will notice.
BOOM!
...the buttered bread falling on the floor, my mother in law slipping on it, her purse hitting the goldfish bowl. Poor goldfish.
You don't want to see the tree. Or the foe. Or the vibe, sicks, heaven, ate!
Focusing your energy is like eating your hat. Er: hatte. Eating your hatte. Look it up.
What's it called when the tiny drink you're about to take evaporates?
A girl in a monocle will die today unless you get back up. Stupid Elf.
I had Strep Thrope once. This promises to be much worse.
Minwell's Angel will stand on your left shoulder all day, encouraging you to do algebra to the poor.
No! It at...um... Norway? Forget Norway! Only in Kenya!
But the light will still take 2.4197 x10^21242 years to reach our planet, so we'll never know...
But yesterday wasn't small...it was just really...far away.
Your touch will cause Zanzarino's head to explode. For our sake, don't use it!
It may -- or may not -- be possible to think inside the box today, so be ready to give outside the box a solid try.
Ever seen a lobotomized dragon ? Prepare for the worst, expect the best.
The world is on fire, but is it a conflagration, or a controllable tool? You must decide.
If you can upgrade your place in life, you'll become a real contributor.
The world is on fire, but is it a conflagration, or a controllable tool? You must decide.
The change you can effect is enormous -- but don't let your inner fragility get the best of you!
Something that has been a major thorn in your side will finally give way. Take advantage!
Don't waste any effort on any side projects. Pick your battle, and fight it with your all.
Concentrate all of your focus on one last-ditch effort -- success will surely follow.
Offense really is the best defense this time around.
If at first you don't succeed, keep trying: every attempt will bring you greater strength.
Sacrifice something unimportant, and you will find the energy to attain your goals.
That energy will benefit greatly from a stable, grounded perspective.
When you risk your health to achieve your goals, you'd better be healthy before you start!
The small and the weak are offered up in burning sacrifice. Will you be the sacrificed, or the glorified?
Your touch brings an anger that will drive the meek to their knees in impotent rage. Use it -- carefully.
They have taken advantage of you, insulted you, and reduced you to a lifeless nothing - they think. They do not know, what you are capable of -yet.
Your guardian angel is in one hell of a mood today. Say your prayers and chaaaaarge!
The world seems to orbit you today. Your pull is irresistable, but be careful what gathers around.
Your touch saps energy but motiviates you. Use it on your more apathetic victims for best effect.
A slow but strong ally steps between you and your critics. Let him take the heat.
You gain momentum as your rivals come up short. Run with it!
Power builds slowly like geothermic energy pushing magma ever upwards. Wait for it.
Some local 'heavies' will offer their assistance to you, cheap. Don't risk turning them down.
The world seems to orbit you today. Your pull is irresistable, but be careful what gathers around.
If you make another person the center of your world, you can avoid some significant troubles.
Your big worries will slide right off your back, but ignore that advice about not sweating the small stuff.
You're the big kid on campus today. Talk the talk, because walking the walk will come naturally.
This is the time to attempt the impossible. With just a little extra effort, you can be Unstoppable!
You Food is critical to your success today. Eat well, power up, and attack the day.
Nothing will try to get in your way today. Every time life closes a door, kick it back open!
Your efforts are best focused on tackling great challenges today. You will succeed where others fail.
Today you will be a (Mass * Acceleration) to be reckoned with. Use it, Luke.
What do you call a cross between a Blue Crawler and a Cockatrice and a Maxwel's Demon and a Purple Nymph?
You will be called on to make great sacrifice today...so choose who to sacrifice carefully.
Recycle. Green is the new black.
The world is growing faster than ever. Blossom -- or be overrun.
Activity is the name of the game. Keep moving, far past your supposed limits, and success will come.
Only the most minor annoyances can be successfully shrugged off. Be ready.
Something that you thought would petrify you turns out to be a significant ally. Keep an eye out.
You will recover from your setbacks with vim and vigor. Don't be afraid of a little adversity.
When the morning sun hits the Rustling leaves, you will arrive on the scene with alacrity and power.
The world is growing faster than ever. Blossom -- or be overrun.
Reflect on your challenges, and don't sweat the small stuff. Put your effort where it is due.
Understanding those around you will infuse your life with fresh energy and renewed determination.
Nurture your smaller allies. They will Grow beyond your expectations if the environment is right.
Your touch will turn the weak into forces to be reckoned with. Use it!
If the best offense is a good defense, than the best vengeance is outliving them all.
What sounds like an innocent or even pathetic proposal will jump out at you with startling strength.
All Life feeds on the energy of the sun. You would be wise to harness that energy for yourself.
Best to tackle your problems before they're ready for you - and get in a hti that will keep on hurting after they are!
It's a rare occasion that one person can generate something of significance all by themselves. This is a rare occasion.
The world has no secrets; the sacredness of All is illuminated. Access your inner Power and LIVE.
A force beyond human ken empowers your efforts. You can do the superhuman today.
A force beyond human ken watches over you. No lasting harm can come to you.
Dwell not in the shadows, or the Light that could be thy guide will in its stead smite and defy thee.
And you are the BIGGEST of them all. This big light of y'ine, you'd better let it shine...
The world has no secrets; the sacredness of All is illuminated. Access your inner Power and LIVE.
Enlightenment comes from several unexpected sources. Keep your mind open.
Your efforts cannot be ignored. Get Animated, and you will find Glory in the struggle.
Like a shooting star, your progress today cannot be followed by the naked eye. Soar!
You know they are. But what are you? No, really: what ARE you?
Dwell not in the shadows, or the Light that could be thy guide will in its stead smite and defy thee.
The light of truth will be your aegis, protecting you...a little.
Your touch brings forth the inner light of those you hold dear. Use it.
Find a place nobody can disturb you; shut the door and close that chaotic world outside.
Draw your blade - or someone else's blade, for that matter - and step boldly into the fray.
Never despair, you are alive, it's a gift; use it.
Just as failure seems inevitable, you will snatch victory from the jaws of defeat.
The world feels both ancient and new. Draw on the success of the past to guide your future.
The old gods still hold sway, so be careful to whom you sacrifice. Immortality may be at stake.
Take your time today.
You are a timeless juggernaut; an eternal powerhouse before which little can stand. Charge!
If your risky behavior doesn't pay off, you can always ask for a do-over.
One of your long-term investments will unexpectedly hatch today. Can you make use of it?
Ideas will come fast and furious all day. Bring a notebook.
Your touch brings sudden insight and new inspiration. Use it generously.
Don't think about the past -- look to the future for a useful new idea.
In fact, take someone else's time, too. They won't miss it.
Use it to gather like-minded people around you. Strength in numbers is the name of the game.
Everyone else will do the same. Use the pause to enlighten yourself.
The world feels both ancient and new. Draw on the success of the past to guide your future.
The ones working against you will be delayed and confounded. Take advantage while you can.
Obsession; you stop and you stare too much, afraid that you care to much, and you hardly dare to touch for fear that your mind may be broken.
No, you are not a divinity, but you might trick naive people into believing that you are one.
You have the opportunity to be a real headache today.
he world flows. Like a moving stream, you can never be in the same world twice. Flow with it.
Someone who holds you dear will easily handle a few big problems for you -- for a while.
Don't underestimate yourself; even if you feel small and blue, you still have the power you need..
It's not a day to tackle things head-on. A more subtle, backhanded approach will get you far.
Problems have a way of seeming like they'll never come to bear today, but take care - they will.
The more energy you put into solving a problem, the better -- even if you just delay things.
Some may think you frigid, but the truth is just that you have MUCH bigger things to attend to.
Your caution will be rewarded when your biggest annoyances are held at bay for a time.
A little abstract thought will reveal a way to disable your most pervasive annoyances.
Your touch will bring new life to the same-old same-old. Use it.
The world gives way to entirely new ways of life. Pay attention to your environment for true inspiration.
A 24-hour detoxification fast of lemon juice and almonds will bring great health.
he world flows. Like a moving stream, you can never be in the same world twice. Flow with it.
hen threats arise, make yourself appear as big and dangerous as possible.
he Earth itself trembles before your will. Be careful what you will!
Life is overwhelming sometime; try to stay afloat, prioritize.
Some like it hot. Today, be one of them - just don't forget to let off some steam.
In particular, let your problems ebb -- you enjoy the flow.
You are more dangerous than anyone gives you credit for. Stay concealed until absolutely necessary.
Kinetic energy is your ally. Strike first, strike hard, no mercy, Sir!
The world could go in any direction. Only true flexibility can maximize your circumstances today.
Your best role today is that of last-minute addition to a solid team. Find one, and join it.
Like water off a Blue Crawler's back; that's how your troubles will feel today.
They might think they can soar past on their way to glory, but they're about to get shafted.
